<!doctypehtml><html lang="en"><meta charset="UTF-8"><meta content="width=device-width,initial-scale=1"name="viewport"><title>Retro Racer</title><link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Silkscreen&display=swap"rel="stylesheet"><style>body{background-color:#000;font-family:Silkscreen,sans-serif;color:#fff;text-align:center}.game-container{margin:0 auto;width:600px;height:300px;border:5px solid #fff;position:relative;background-color:#222;overflow:hidden}.opponent,.player{width:120px;height:90px;position:absolute}.player{bottom:20px}.opponent{top:20px}.finish-line{height:100%;width:20px;background-color:#fff;position:absolute;right:0;top:0}.scoreboard{font-size:1.5em;margin-top:10px}</style><h1>Retro Racer :D</h1><div class="scoreboard"><p>Races Won: <span id="score">User: 0 | Comp: 0</span></div><div class="game-container"><img alt="Player"class="player"id="player"src="https://cloud-jyv779cc6-hack-club-bot.vercel.app/0user.png"> <img alt="Opponent"class="opponent"id="opponent"src="https://cloud-jyv779cc6-hack-club-bot.vercel.app/1comp.png"><div class="finish-line"></div></div><script>const player=document.getElementById("player"),opponent=document.getElementById("opponent"),scoreElem=document.getElementById("score");let playerPos={x:20,y:230},opponentPos={x:20,y:20},playerWins=0,compWins=0,playerSpeed=5,opponentSpeed=3+3*Math.random();function updatePlayer(){player.style.left=`${playerPos.x}px`,checkWin()}function updateOpponent(){opponentPos.x+=opponentSpeed,opponent.style.left=`${opponentPos.x}px`,checkWin()}function checkWin(){playerPos.x>=580?(playerWins++,resetGame()):opponentPos.x>=580&&(compWins++,resetGame())}function resetGame(){playerPos={x:20,y:230},opponentPos={x:20,y:20},playerSpeed=5+3*Math.random(),opponentSpeed=3+3*Math.random(),player.style.left=`${playerPos.x}px`,opponent.style.left=`${opponentPos.x}px`,scoreElem.textContent=`User: ${playerWins} | Comp: ${compWins}`}function gameLoop(){updateOpponent(),requestAnimationFrame(gameLoop)}document.addEventListener("keydown",e=>{"ArrowRight"===e.key&&(playerPos.x+=playerSpeed),"ArrowLeft"===e.key&&(playerPos.x-=playerSpeed),updatePlayer()}),gameLoop();</script>
